channel.title: securité on Mezalor
channel.description: Recent content in securité on Mezalor

item.title: http, headers sur la gestion du cache et de la sécurité
item.description: public static void addNoCacheHeaders(HttpServletResponse resp) { resp.addHeader(HttpHeaders.CACHE_CONTROL, "max-age=0, no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate, proxy-revalidate, private"); resp.addHeader(HttpHeaders.PRAGMA, "no-cache"); resp.addHeader(HttpHeaders.EXPIRES, "-1"); } public static void addSecurityHeaders(HttpServletResponse resp) { resp.addHeader(HttpHeaders.X_FRAME_OPTIONS, "DENY"); resp.addHeader(HttpHeaders.X_XSS_PROTECTION, "1; mode=block"); resp.addHeader(HttpHeaders.X_CONTENT_TYPE_OPTIONS, "nosniff"); }
